identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a dark, futuristic, yet trustworthy career transition platform that feels like a high-end tool for tech professionals.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Gaming aesthetics.
Emotion First: Empower the user, make them feel 'upgraded'.
Content is King: Data is the hero, UI is the stage.
Negative Space: Luxurious spacing to reduce cognitive load.

headings.usage: Main headings, section titles, big numbers.

mono.usage: Code snippets, ATS scores, technical skills.

typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Do NOT use Inter for headings.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

dashboard.grid_type: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
dashboard.container: w-full h-screen overflow-hidden grid grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 transition-all

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-gradient-to-b from-white/5 to-transparent p-1 border border-white/10 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-500
cards.stat: bg-card border border-border p-6 rounded-xl flex flex-col justify-between

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg h-12 px-4 text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

hero_background.desc: Abstract dark data flow, use as background with heavy overlay (opacity 20%)

community_section.desc: Diverse team collaborating, use in 'Join Community' or 'About' section

landing.hero: Use the 'Abstract dark data flow' image as a subtle background. Large typography: 'Transition into AI'. CTA: 'Analyze Resume'. Use a 'Tracing Beam' effect on the CTA button container.
landing.features: Use a Bento Grid layout. Mix 3D icons (Spline or Lucide with glow) with text.
landing.pricing: Glassmorphism cards. Highlight 'Pro' plan with a neon border glow.

upload.layout: Centered, focused. Drag & drop zone should pulse slowly. Use a 'Scanner' animation line when file is dropped.
upload.feedback: Show parsing progress with a technical, terminal-like log output (JetBrains Mono font).

role_selection.grid: Grid of cards. Each card represents a role (e.g., 'AI Product Manager'). Hovering a card should reveal 'Match Score' (mocked for now) or 'Avg Salary'.
role_selection.interaction: Select multiple roles. 'Next' button floats at the bottom.

analysis_dashboard.layout: Control Room Grid. Dense but organized.
widgets: Skill Gap Analysis (Bar Chart - Red vs Green)
analysis_dashboard.visuals: Use Recharts with the defined 'chart_colors'. Dark background for charts, bright lines.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode is PRIMARY. Do not design for light mode first.
No generic gradients. Use noise textures and subtle glows.
Buttons must feel tactile (scale on press).
